1_1F4DKSRBpoHN7ueQvkeM5x4AhfE65v3MN3.body: your masterseed is in that file . do you want to login to a proxy or you want to install zero on another PC?

anyways , moral of the story is ,  backup your users.json . I keep my seeds in a separate file for extra security .
